Container.Name: binhex-official-metube
Container.Overview: MeTube is a web GUI for youtube-dl with playlist support. Allows you to download videos from YouTube and dozens of other sites. Features: Download videos from YouTube, Vimeo, and many other sites, Queue downloads and track progress, Playlist support, Dark/light themes, Custom output directories, Audio-only downloads, and much more.
Container.DonateText: If you appreciate my work, then please consider buying me a beer :D

Config.Name: Port: Web Interface
Config.Description: This is the TCP port for the WebUI

Config.Name: Variable: CUSTOM_DIRS
Config.Description: Whether to enable downloading videos into custom directories

Config.Name: Variable: DOWNLOAD_MODE
Config.Description: Controls how downloads are scheduled and executed

Config.Name: Variable: MAX_CONCURRENT_DOWNLOADS
Config.Description: Maximum number of simultaneous downloads (used with limited mode)

Config.Name: Variable: DOWNLOAD_DIR
Config.Description: Path to where the downloads will be saved

Config.Name: Variable: DEFAULT_THEME
Config.Description: Default theme to use for the UI

Config.Name: Variable: AUDIO_DOWNLOAD_DIR
Config.Description: Path to where audio-only downloads will be saved (defaults to DOWNLOAD_DIR if empty)

Config.Name: Variable: DOWNLOAD_DIRS_INDEXABLE
Config.Description: If true, the download dirs are indexable on the webserver

Config.Name: Variable: CREATE_CUSTOM_DIRS
Config.Description: Whether to support automatically creating directories if they do not exist

Config.Name: Variable: CUSTOM_DIRS_EXCLUDE_REGEX
Config.Description: Regular expression to exclude some custom directories from the drop-down

Config.Name: Variable: STATE_DIR
Config.Description: Path to where the queue persistence files will be saved

Config.Name: Variable: TEMP_DIR
Config.Description: Path where intermediary download files will be saved

Config.Name: Variable: DELETE_FILE_ON_TRASHCAN
Config.Description: If true, downloaded files are deleted when trashed from the UI

Config.Name: Variable: URL_PREFIX
Config.Description: Base path for the web server (for reverse proxy use)

Config.Name: Variable: PUBLIC_HOST_URL
Config.Description: Base URL for download links shown in the UI

Config.Name: Variable: HTTPS
Config.Description: Use HTTPS instead of HTTP (requires CERTFILE and KEYFILE)

Config.Name: Variable: CERTFILE
Config.Description: HTTPS certificate file path

Config.Name: Variable: KEYFILE
Config.Description: HTTPS key file path

Config.Name: Variable: PUBLIC_HOST_AUDIO_URL
Config.Description: Base URL for audio download links

Config.Name: Variable: OUTPUT_TEMPLATE
Config.Description: Template for downloaded video filenames

Config.Name: Variable: OUTPUT_TEMPLATE_CHAPTER
Config.Description: Template for chapter filenames

Config.Name: Variable: OUTPUT_TEMPLATE_PLAYLIST
Config.Description: Template for playlist video filenames

Config.Name: Variable: DEFAULT_OPTION_PLAYLIST_STRICT_MODE
Config.Description: If true, strict playlist mode is enabled by default

Config.Name: Variable: DEFAULT_OPTION_PLAYLIST_ITEM_LIMIT
Config.Description: Maximum number of playlist items that can be downloaded (0 = no limit)

Config.Name: Variable: YTDL_OPTIONS
Config.Description: Additional options to pass to yt-dlp in JSON format

Config.Name: Variable: YTDL_OPTIONS_FILE
Config.Description: Path to JSON file for yt-dlp options

Config.Name: Variable: ROBOTS_TXT
Config.Description: Path to robots.txt file mounted in the container

Config.Name: Variable: LOGLEVEL
Config.Description: Log level for the application

Config.Name: Variable: ENABLE_ACCESSLOG
Config.Description: Whether to enable access log

Config.Name: Variable: PUID
Config.Description: User ID under which MeTube will run

Config.Name: Variable: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID under which MeTube will run

Config.Name: Variable: UMASK
Config.Description: Umask value used by MeTube

Config.Name: Path: /downloads
Config.Description: This is the path to store downloaded videos

Config.Name: Path: /config
Config.Description: This is the path to store MeTube configuration files
